author: @sultanknish
title: Members of Congress Stand Up to Sharia Law | Frontpage Mag
text:
|
Getting your
|
It’s about time that members of Congress are speaking out about the threat of Islamic Sharia law.
In radical Islamic countries, it is considered normal for men to marry 6-year-olds.
Pedophilia is rampant and women are lucky if they are allowed to drive.
Where is the outrage from “feminists” about the RAMPANT ABUSE of women in Islamic countries???
[pic.twitter.com/1TSJimnTRc]— Coach Tommy Tuberville (@SenTuberville)
[October 9, 2025]
Radical Islamists would like to see every freedom-loving American DEAD.
This isn’t politically correct to say, but it’s true.
If you live in America and practice Sharia Law, you should be DEPORTED IMMEDIATELY.
[pic.twitter.com/x2DFHg8KEG]— Coach Tommy Tuberville (@SenTuberville)
[October 8, 2025]
New York City first. Your community next.
The advancement of Sharia law and Islamists in the United States must be stopped.
[https://t.co/wcFbT5K85g]— Rep. Chip Roy Press Office (@RepChipRoy)
[October 8, 2025]
Importing Islamic terrorists into America is suicidal.
They all need to be deported.
[https://t.co/BNoqMxuYx7]— Congressman Brandon Gill (@RepBrandonGill)
[October 8, 2025]
I just introduced the No Sharia Act, which would ensure that no U.S. court, public agency, or legal institution can ever enforce or legitimize Sharia law.⁰⁰You don’t get to come to this country and demand that our legal system accommodate your oppressive laws.
Proud to work…
[pic.twitter.com/oEOZpO45gc]— Congressman Randy Fine (@RepFine)
[September 20, 2025]
Proud to co-sponsor this bill to ban Sharia in the United States with
[@RepFine]. Sharia is NOT compatible with the U.S. Constitution.[https://t.co/CK0sddBhgN]— Rep. Keith Self (@RepKeithSelf)
[September 20, 2025]
This is one way to tell who’s on Qatar’s payroll. And who isn’t.
